SEARCH
Package Controller

Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
Controller.PatientController
public class PatientController extends Object
The PatientController class manages all interactions and functionalities available for a patient. This includes scheduling, rescheduling, and canceling appointments, viewing medical records, and updating contact information.

  • Constructor Summary

    PatientController(Patient patient)
    Constructs a PatientController instance for the specified patient.
